comprehensive_overview: JupyterLab is a web-based interactive development environment for Jupyter notebooks, code, and data. It offers a flexible and powerful user interface to work with data, code, and visualization in a seamless manner.
core_features: Support for Jupyter notebooks, text editors, terminals, and custom components
Integration with data visualization libraries and tools
Ability to work with multiple programming languages like Python, R, and Julia
Customizable user interface with drag-and-drop features
Interactive widgets for data exploration and visualization
